Carney is set to give speeches aimed at drumming up investments in Canada, while meeting with leaders of countries, institutions and corporations. U.S. President Donald Trump

articles.title: Inflation rises to 2.4% in December in ‘tax holiday’ rebound: StatCan
articles.description: Statistics Canada says the end of the federal government’s “tax holiday” a year earlier pushed the annual pace of inflation up two ticks to 2.4 per cent in December. articles.title: High-speed train crash in Spain kills at least 39

articles.title: Death toll in Spanish train collision rises to 39 and authorities fear more bodies could be found
articles.description: ADAMUZ, Spain (AP) — Spanish police said Monday that at least 39 people are confirmed dead in a high-speed rail collision the previous night in the south of the country when the tail end of a train jumped the track, causing another train speeding past in the opposite direction to derail. articles.title: How the frog meat trade helped spread a deadly fungus worldwide
articles.description: A deadly fungus that has wiped out hundreds of amphibian species worldwide may have started its global journey in Brazil. Genetic evidence and trade data suggest the fungus hitchhiked across the world via international frog meat markets. The findings raise urgent concerns about how wildlife trade ca

articles.description: António Guterres says Washington's "clear conviction" is that multilateral solutions are irrelevant.

articles.title: New research shows emotional expressions work differently in autism
articles.description: Researchers found that autistic and non-autistic people move their faces differently when expressing emotions like anger, happiness, and sadness. Autistic participants tended to rely on different facial features and produced more varied expressions, which can look unfamiliar to non-autistic observer
